name: Lovely Pleasant Teatime Simulator
description:
As seen in Rock, Paper, Shotgun!

Lovely Pleasant Teatime Simulator is an interactive tea party experience in which absolutely nothing awful will happen whatsoever and everybody involved will have a wonderful time.

Tweet a screenshot of your final score with the hashtag #LovelyPleasantTeatime to earn your place in history as a connoisseur of tea and scones.
